name: Hive (itch) (dEta)
description:
A resource management game with BEES.

Art by @ciaoora

Made for Brackeys 2021 Game Jam "Stronger Together"

Tips:
- Try using Keyboard and Mouse Controls!

- Bees wont attack while following your mouse!

- You can pull bees away from bears to dodge their attacks

- Make sure to keep upgrading and building bees, time is key!
